sentences.en: According to the tentative cargo plan, we should first load the Dar es Salaam bath towel.
sentences.cn: 根据配载图, 我们应先装达累期萨拉姆的浴巾,但现在八幡的青岛贝雕已错装到了那里.

sentences.en: Construction of the ultra - modern new National Stadium in Dar Es Salaam which is nearing completion.
sentences.cn: 中国在达累斯萨拉姆援建的体育场即将完工.

sentences.en: In Mivinjeni Primary school in Dar es Salaam I met the head teacher Mr.
sentences.cn: 在达累斯萨拉姆的明杰里小学,我们见到了他们的校长亚历克斯·罗伯茨先生.

sentences.en: The picture shows the train station platform of Tanzania - Zambia railway in Dar es Salaam.
sentences.cn: 图为坦赞铁路达累斯萨拉姆客运车站月台.

sentences.en: The University of Dar es salaam is the oldest and biggest public university in Tanzania.
sentences.cn: 达累斯萨拉姆大学是坦桑尼亚创建最早的,也是最大的公立大学.

phrases.tran_cn: 达累斯萨拉姆（坦桑尼亚首都）

trans.tran_cn: (穆斯林的)额手礼, 问安, 敬礼
